summary:
Implements the unfinished \"Rogue Wizard\" quest for the College of Winterhold.

Features voice-work from the original actors and a new spell cut from the main game!

Speak with Tolfdir after completing \"The Eye of Magnus\" to begin the quest.
descriptionHtml:
[b]SUMMARY[/b]

Implements the unfinished \"Rogue Wizard\" quest for the College of Winterhold.

Features voice-work from the original actors and a new spell cut from the main game!

Speak with Tolfdir after completing \"The Eye of Magnus\" to begin the quest.

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]

Please extract RogueWizard.bsa and RogueWizard.esp to Skyrim\'s Data folder and ensure the mod is set to load before playing.

[b]COMPATIBILITY[/b]

This mod was tested on Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8 and cleaned with TES5Edit v3.0.30.

It will be incompatible with any other mod that modifies the Rogue Wizard quest.

[b]DISCLAIMER[/b]

-Support for this modification will be provided at my discretion.

-Please feel free to distribute this modification provided it remains unaltered.

-Please contact me if you wish to alter or localize this modification.
--I go by \"KainXavier\" on the Nexus network and \"Kain-Xavier\" on Steam.
author: KainXavier
